formattedAddress: 206 W 41st St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 206 W 41st St, New York, NY 10036-7203, USA

editorialSummary.text: Basic hostel-style property a block from Times Square, with free WiFi & continental breakfast.

originalText.text: For a very expensive city to stay in, this rates as brilliant value for money. It's not a hotel and not a hostel, it's somewhere inbetween due to city regulations. Rooms are OK size wise compared to others I have stayed in. The best thing about this place is it is literally around the corner from all of the action.

originalText.text: Si decides ir a este hotel, lo primero que tienes que tener claro es que es un hostel no un hotel.  Te encontrar√°s con un lugar limpio, seguro, sencillo pero eso s√≠ con la mejor ubicaci√≥n posible. El desayuno es todo un lujo para una ciudad con nueva york, caf√©s, tostadas, mantequilla, mermelada, cereales y fruta (no todos los d√≠as). La mayor√≠a de las habitaciones tienen una venta que pr√°cticamente da a un muro (30 cm de distancia) y el calefactor hace mucho ruido, pero si quieres un lugar para dormir y patear la ciudad te lo recomiendo.

text.text: If you decide to go to this hotel, the first thing you have to be clear about is that it is a hostel, not a hotel. You will find a clean, safe, simple place but with the best possible location. Breakfast is a luxury for a city with New York, coffees, toast, butter, jam, cereals and fruit (not every day). Most of the rooms have a window that practically faces a wall (30 cm away) and the heater makes a lot of noise, but if you want a place to sleep and explore the city, I recommend it.

originalText.text:
Das Hostel bietet vor allem eines - Location. Wer sich im Rummel und Trubel der Stadt New York unmittelbar am Times Square aufhalten m√∂chte, ist hier richtig. Vom Hostel selbst darf man trotz des Preises jedoch nicht viel erwarten. Wir hatten ein Doppelzimmer mit eigenem Bad. Das Bad war soweit ok. Die Betten waren Einzelbetten, wovon eines ein Doppelstockbett war. Ich habe schon besser geschlafen, aber es war durchaus ok. Schade fand ich trotz allem, dass die Ausstattung des Zimmers wirklich sehr minimal gehalten wurde - kein TV (womit man in einer Stadt wie NYC noch leben kann), daf√ºr aber 8 Safes - macht keinen guten Eindruck.
Das Personal ist soweit ok, aber nicht wirklich ansprechbar f√ºr Fragen zur Stadt.
Fr√ºhst√ºck ist mit Toast und Bagel in Ordnung und ausreichend f√ºr ein Hostel.

text.text:
The hostel offers one thing above all - location. If you want to be in the hustle and bustle of New York City right next to Times Square, this is the right place for you. Despite the price, you shouldn't expect much from the hostel itself. We had a double room with a private bathroom. The bathroom was ok so far. The beds were single beds, one of which was a double bunk bed. I slept better, but it was okay. Despite everything, I found it a shame that the room's furnishings were really very minimal - no TV (which you can still live with in a city like NYC), but 8 safes - doesn't make a good impression.
The staff is ok so far, but not really responsive to questions about the city.
Breakfast is ok with toast and bagel and sufficient for a hostel.
